ch0136_00_platane/0101_0701_01_10:
Hi there, [Name:PlayerNickname ]!
Having fun on your adventure with your
partner Pokémon?
ch0136_00_platane/0101_0701_02_10:
I hope meeting a lot of Pokémon and Trainers is
enriching your life!
ch0136_00_platane/7101_0701_01_10: I give Trainers their first Pokémon and a Pokédex.
ch0136_00_platane/7101_0701_02_10:
It’s difficult to complete a Pokédex, but in the past,
I met one Trainer who filled it all up!
ch0136_00_platane/7101_0701_03_10:
I couldn’t contain my excitement because that’s
what I live for!
ch0136_00_platane/7101_0701_04_10:
It was a Trainer I sent out into the world, and they
grew so much! That’s why I was so excited.
ch0136_00_platane/7105_0701_01_10:
If you travel to different places, you’ll see different
Pokémon and ways of living.
ch0136_00_platane/7105_0701_02_10:
You’ll also meet a lot of people with different
ways of thinking!
ch0136_00_platane/7105_0701_03_10:
That means your adventure shapes who you are 
as a person, [Name:PlayerNickname ].
ch0136_00_platane/1701_0701_01_10:
Welcome back from another day of adventuring!
There’s a reason why I called out to you. 
Here you go!
ch0136_00_platane/1701_0701_02_10: It was to give you that!
ch0136_00_platane/2501_0701_01_10:
It seems that Pokémon Professors who also battle
are quite rare.
ch0136_00_platane/2501_0701_02_10: I’m not one for all-out battles myself.
ch0136_00_platane/2501_0701_03_10:
But for my research, I do have to learn more
about Trainers and how they battle!
ch0136_00_platane/2501_0702_01_10:
Watching Pokémon battles tells me a lot about a
sync pair.
ch0136_00_platane/2501_0702_02_10:
I can see whether they’ve built up a trusting
relationship or if they’ve just paired up.
ch0136_00_platane/2501_0702_04_10:
Your love for your partner Pokémon
shines through!
ch0136_00_platane/3001_0701_01_10:
Good morning! I’m looking forward to seeing what
sort of people and Pokémon we encounter today.
ch0136_00_platane/3003_0701_01_10:
Research is my passion—the more things I have to
study, the more excited I get!
ch0136_00_platane/3005_0701_01_10:
I’ve been sampling the local fare while strolling
through town lately. It’s really quite fun! And now
I know where to find Pasio’s best cafés!
